name: Dot To Dot - Twice The Fun
name_original: Dot To Dot - Twice The Fun
description:
Dot To Dot is a simple yet addictive puzzle game.

Connect all matching colors with lines to fill the entire board. But watch out, pipes will break if they cross or overlap!

Why this game?

- Clean, colorful graphics
- Delicious HD colorful graphics!
- 750 levels !
- Free Play: casual play
- Easy and fun to play
- Suitable for both adults and kids!
- Unlimited undo or get hints!
- Add letters to show colors
- Night mode
- Game center enabled
- Lots of ipad packs 13x13,14x14,12x12,11x11 !
- Label mode
